question: When did Akbar invaded Chittorgarh fort?
explanation: In 1568 AD, the Mughal Emperor Akbar attacked and conquered the Chittorgarh fort and the third Jauhar at Chittor took place. Though, Rana Udai Singh II and the royal family of Mewar escaped before the capture of the fort and moved to the foothills ofÂ  Aravalli range where Rana Udai Singh founded the new city, Udaipur.
